title: PhenotypicFeature
description: Used to describe a phenotype that characterizes the subject or biosample.

description.description: Unstructured text to describe additional properties of this phenotypic feature.

featureType.description: Term denoting the phenotypic feature. REQUIRED.

modifiers.description: For instance one or more terms from HP:0012823

onset.description: Age or time at which the feature was first observed.

resolution.description: Age or time at which the feature resolved or abated.

evidence.description: The evidence for an assertion of the observation of a type. RECOMMENDED.
